name: No6Alley76 Apartment
address: No6 Alley 76 Linh Lang str, Ba Dinh Dist, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
No6Alley76 Apartment is set in Hanoi, 1.2 km from Vincom Center Nguyen Chi Thanh. Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is 1.4 km from the property. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

All units are air conditioned and include a TV. Some units feature a seating area and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a microwave. A fridge and kettle are also available. Towels are provided.

Giang Vo Exhibition Center is 1.6 km from No6Alley76 Apartment, while One Pillar Pagoda is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 20 km from No6Alley76 Apartment.
